WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE QUARTERMASTER CORPS? INSPECTS MEAT (SCORE AS -1) SUPPLIES CLOTHING (SCORE AS +1) TESTS WEAPONS AND AMMUNITION (SCORE AS -1) TRAINS COOKS AND BAKERS (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT? REPAIRS TRUCKS AND WEAPONS (SCORE AS +1) REPAIRS TELEGRAPH LINES (SCORE AS -1) BUILDS LANDING FIELDS (SCORE AS -1) MANUFACTURES AMMUNITION (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE MEDICAL DEPARTMENT? OPERATES FIELD HOSPITALS (SCORE AS +1) SELLS INSURANCE (SCORE AS -1) DRIVES AMBULANCES (SCORE AS +1) STERILIZES CLOTHING (SCORE AS -1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE SIGNAL CORPS? PLOTS ENEMY ARTILLERY FIRE (SCORE AS -1) OPERATES AIR CRAFT WARNING SERVICE (SCORE AS +1) PLANS TROOP MOVEMENTS (SCORE AS -1) OPERATES MESSAGE CENTERS (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE? DECONTAMINATION (SCORE AS +1) TREATS GAS WOUNDS (SCORE AS -1) STERILIZES CLOTHING (SCORE AS -1) OPERATES FLAME THROWERS (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE FIELD ARTILLERY? LAYS LAND MINES (SCORE AS -1) COUNTERBATTERY FIRE (SCORE AS +1) PLOTS ENEMY ARTILLERY FIRE (SCORE AS +1) FIRES ANTI-AIRCRAFT GUNS (SCORE AS -1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE ENGINEERS? BUILDS BRIDGES (SCORE AS +1) LAYS LAND MINES (SCORE AS +1) SURVEYS ENEMY POSITIONS (SCORE AS -1) PUTS UP TELEGRAPH LINES (SCORE AS -1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE ARMORED FORCES? LAYS LAND MINES (SCORE AS -1) PROTECTS TROOPS FROM MECHANIZED ATTACKS (SCORE AS +1) TRANSPORTS TROOPS TO THE FRONT (SCORE AS -1) USES HEAVY TANKS (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT? REPAIRS TRUCKS AND WEAPONS (SCORE AS +1) REPAIRS TELEGRAPH LINES (SCORE AS -1) BUILDS LANDING FIELDS (SCORE AS -1) MANUFACTURES AMMUNITION (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE MEDICAL DEPARTMENT? OPERATES FIELD HOSPITALS (SCORE AS +1) SELLS INSURANCE (SCORE AS -1) DRIVES AMBULANCES (SCORE AS +1) STERILIZES CLOTHING (SCORE AS -1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE SIGNAL CORPS? PLOTS ENEMY ARTILLERY FIRE (SCORE AS -1) OPERATES AIR CRAFT WARNING SERVICE (SCORE AS +1) PLANS TROOP MOVEMENTS (SCORE AS -1) OPERATES MESSAGE CENTERS (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE? DECONTAMINATION (SCORE AS +1) TREATS GAS WOUNDS (SCORE AS -1) STERILIZES CLOTHING (SCORE AS -1) OPERATES FLAME THROWERS (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE ENGINEERS? BUILDS BRIDGES (SCORE AS +1) LAYS LAND MINES (SCORE AS +1) SURVEYS ENEMY POSITIONS (SCORE AS -1) PUTS UP TELEGRAPH LINES (SCORE AS -1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE ARMORED FORCES? LAYS LAND MINES (SCORE AS -1) PROTECTS TROOPS FROM MECHANIZED ATTACKS (SCORE AS +1) TRANSPORTS TROOPS TO THE FRONT (SCORE AS -1) USES HEAVY TANKS (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE AIR CORPS? BUILDS LANDING FIELDS (SCORE AS -1) MAKES PHOTOGRAPHIC MAPS (SCORE AS +1) TESTS NEW AIRPLANES (SCORE AS +1) OPERATES ANTI-AIRCRAFT GUNS (SCORE AS -1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE MILITARY POLICE? MAKES TROOP INSPECTIONS (SCORE AS -1) SOLVES CODES AND SECRET MESSAGES (SCORE AS -1) CONTROLS TRAFFIC IN THE FIELD (SCORE AS +1) PRESERVES LAW AND ORDER (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE TRANSPORTATION CORPS? SHIPS MEN OVERSEAS (SCORE AS +1) LAYS RAILROAD TRACKS (SCORE AS -1) MOVES ADVANCE MATERIALS (SCORE AS +1) REPAIRS TRUCKS (SCORE AS -1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE COAST ARTILLERY CORPS? LAYS OFF-SHORE MINES (SCORE AS +1) GATHERS WEATHER INFORMATION (SCORE AS -1) LAYS LAND MINES (SCORE AS -1) FIRES ANTI-AIRCRAFT GUNS (SCORE AS +1)

COMMENTS ON IMPROVING RADIO SERVICE:
UNIT IDENTIFICATION:
THE BEST WAY TO GET MOST MEN TO BEHAVE IS TO PUNISH THEM EVERYTIME THEY DON'T BEHAVE.
A NONCOM SHOULD ALWAYS KEEP HIS MEN BUSY DURING DUTY HOURS, EVEN IF HE HAS TO MAKE THEM DO UNNECESSARY WORK.
A NONCOM HAS TO BE VERY STRICT WITH HIS MEN OR ELSE THEY WILL TAKE ADVANTAGE OF HIM.
IT IS JUST AS IMPORTANT FOR A NONCOM TO BE LIKED BY HIS MEN AS IT IS FOR HIM TO KNOW HIS STUFF.
MEN LEARN BETTER WHEN THEY KNOW WHY A SUBJECT IS BEING TAUGHT.
A NONCOM WHO IS FRIENDLY IN THE BARRACKS LOSES SOME OF HIS AUTHORITY ON THE DRILL FIELD.
A NONCOM CAN DO A BETTER JOB IF THE MEN IN HIS SQUAD ARE AFRAID OF HIM.
A NONCOM CAN GET HIS MEN TO WORK BETTER IF HE TELLS THEM WHY A JOB HAS TO BE DONE.
THE NONCOM HIMSELF IS LARGELY TO BLAME IF HIS MEN ARE ALWAYS GETTING INTO TROUBLE.
A NONCOM SHOULD HELP THE MEN IN HIS SQUAD TO GET ALONG TOGETHER.
WHEN A NONCOM GIVES AN ORDER A PRIVATE SHOULD ALWAYS OBEY IT WITHOUT QUESTION, EVEN IF HE THINKS IT'S WRONG.
A NONCOM SHOULD BE ABLE TO GET HIS MEN TO DO THEIR WORK WITHOUT EVER HAVING TO YELL AT THEM.
A SUBJECT SHOULD NEVER BE TAUGHT WITHOUT THE MEN BEING TOLD WHY THEY HAVE TO LEARN IT.
THE MEN SHOULD NOT EXPECT THEIR NONCOM TO GO OUT OF HIS WAY TO HELP THEM SINCE HE HAS HIS OWN TROUBLES.
A NONCOM SHOULD ALWAYS INSIST THAT HIS MEN DO EVERYTHING EXACTLY AS STATED IN REGULATIONS.
A NONCOM WHO REALLY DOES HIS JOB, CANNOT EXPECT TO BE POPULAR WITH THE MEN.
A NONCOM SHOULD TEACH HIS MEN TO OBEY ALL RULES AND REGULATIONS WITHOUT QUESTIONING THEM.
THE NONCOM HIMSELF IS LARGELY TO BLAME IF THE MEN FALL DOWN ON A JOB.
ON A FATIGUE DETAIL, A NONCOM SHOULD SEE THAT THE MEN UNDER HIM GET THE WORK DONE, BUT SHOULD NOT HELP THEM DO IT.
THE EASIER A NONCOM WORKS HIS MEN, THE MORE RESPECT THEY WILL HAVE FOR HIM.
THE BEST WAY TO TEACH MEN IN A CLASSROOM, IS TO FORGET THAT THEY ARE SOLDIERS AND TO TREAT THEM LIKE ANY OTHER STUDENTS.
NO MATTER HOW STUPID THE MEN IN A SQUAD ARE, A GOOD NONCOM CAN MAKE GOOD SOLDIERS OUT OF THEM.
GIVING FATIGUE DETAIL TO A MAN WHO FALLS ASLEEP IN CLASS IS A GOOD WAY TO MAKE HIM PAY ATTENTION NEXT TIME.
A NONCOM SHOULD DISCOURAGE HIS MEN FROM BOTHERING HIM WITH THEIR PERSONAL PROBLEMS.
A NONCOM WILL LOSE SOME OF THE RESPECT OF HIS MEN IF HE PALS AROUND WITH THEM OFF-DUTY.
A NONCOM IN CHARGE OF A DETAIL SHOULD USUALLY KEEP THE MEN WORKING AT A FAST PACE.
A NONCOM SHOULD BE AS STRICT IN THE CLASSROOM AS HE IS ON THE DRILL-FIELD.
WHENEVER HE CAN, THE NONCOM SHOULD LET THE MEN DECIDE AMONG THEMSELVES AS TO THE BEST WAY TO DO A JOB.
A NONCOM SHOULD NOT LET THE MEN IN HIS SQUAD FORGET THAT HE IS A NONCOM EVEN WHEN OFF-DUTY.
THE HARDER A NONCOM WORKS HIS MEN, THE MORE RESPECT THEY WILL HAVE FOR HIM.
IF A MAN DOES NOT TAKE HIS CLASS-WORK SERIOUSLY, IT IS HIS OWN TOUGH LUCK AND THE NONCOM SHOULD PAY NO ATTENTION TO HIM.
IF A NONCOM IS FRIENDLY WITH ANY OF THE MEN, THEY WILL EXPECT HIM TO GIVE THEM SOFT JOBS WHENEVER HE CAN.
MOST MEN PREFER AN EASY NONCOM WHO DOESN'T KNOW HIS STUFF TO A TOUGH ONE WHO DOES.

SUPPOSE YOU ARE A PLATOON SERGEANT AND YOU FIND SOME OF YOUR MEN SHOOTING CRAP IN THE BARRACKS DURING THE EVENING. YOU ARE SURE THAT NOBODY ELSE BUT YOU WILL DISCOVER THEM. WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?

SUPPOSE YOU ARE A NONCOM IN CHARGE OF A DETAIL TO POLICE-UP THE COMPANY AREA AND AFTER THE MEN HAVE FINISHED THE JOB AND YOU HAVE DISMISSED THEM, YOU FIND A FEW CIGARETTE BUTTS THAT THEY MISSED. WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?
SUPPOSE YOU ARE A NONCOM WHO IS IN CHARGE OF QUARTERS ON SUNDAY NIGHT AND A BUCK PRIVATE COMES IN AN HOUR AFTER YOU HAVE MADE BED CHECK. NO ONE KNOWS ABOUT IT. WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?
SUPPOSE YOU ARE A PLATOON SERGEANT AND YOU FIND THAT ONE OF THE MEN IN YOUR BARRACKS HAS BROUGHT A BOTTLE OF LIQUOR INTO CAMP. WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?

SUPPOSE YOU ARE A NONCOM IN CHARGE OF A DETAIL TO BUILD A BRIDGE. YOUR C.O. TELLS YOU JUST EXACTLY HOW HE WANTS IT DONE. ONE OF THE MEN UNDER YOU SUGGESTS THAT YOU SHOULD BUILD A DIFFERENT TYPE OF BRIDGE THAT WOULD BE BETTER AND WOULD TAKE A LOT LESS TIME TO BUILD. YOU WOULD LIKE TO ASK THE C.O. ABOUT IT BUT HE HAS GONE FOR THE DAY. WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?
SUPPOSE YOU ARE A NONCOM AND ARE PUT IN CHARGE OF A DETAIL TO CAMOUFLAGE A GUN POSITION. YOU ARE NOT QUITE SURE HOW TO GO ABOUT IT AND HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FIND OUT. WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?
SUPPOSE YOU ARE A SQUAD LEADER. ONE NIGHT YOU GO INTO TOWN AND FIND ONE OF YOUR MEN LYING DRUNK IN THE GUTTER. WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?

SUPPOSE YOU WERE A PLATOON SERGEANT AND FOUND THAT THERE WAS A CIGARETTE BUTT IN THE LATRINE URINAL AFTER YOU'VE TOLD THE MEN AGAIN AND AGAIN NOT TO THROW THEM THERE. YOU CAN'T FIND OUT WHO DID IT. WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?

SUPPOSE YOU ARE A NONCOM IN CHARGE OF A DITCH-DIGGING DETAIL WHICH IS SUPPOSED TO TAKE ALL DAY. YOUR MEN WORK HARD AND FINISH UP EARLY IN THE AFTERNOON. NOBODY IS GOING TO CHECK UP ON YOU. WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?

SUPPOSE YOU ARE A FIRST SERGEANT AND YOUR COMPANY IS BEING PUNISHED BY BEING RESTRICTED FOR THE WEEK-END. YOUR C.O. HAS TOLD YOU THAT HE WILL NOT ISSUE ANY PASSES. A MAN WHOSE WIFE HAS JUST COME TO TOWN ASKS YOU IF HE CAN HAVE A PASS TO SEE HER. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?
DID HE USUALLY GIVE THE MEN UNDER HIM A CHANCE TO ASK QUESTIONS AS TO THE REASON WHY THINGS WERE DONE THE WAY THEY WERE?
DID HE USUALLY EXPLAIN TO THE MEN WHY SOMETHING HAD TO BE DONE?
DID HE ALWAYS INSIST THAT THE MEN DO EVERYTHING EXACTLY AS STATED IN THE REGULATIONS?
DID HE USUALLY HELP AND ADVISE THE MEN UNDER HIM WHEN THEY GOT INTO TROUBLE?

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE? DECONTAMINATION (SCORE AS +1) TREATS GAS WOUNDS (SCORE AS -1) STERILIZES CLOTHING (SCORE AS -1) OPERATES FLAME THROWERS (SCORE AS +1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE ENGINEERS? BUILDS BRIDGES (SCORE AS +1) LAYS LAND MINES (SCORE AS +1) SURVEYS ENEMY POSITIONS (SCORE AS -1) PUTS UP TELEGRAPH LINES (SCORE AS -1)

WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DUTIES OR JOBS ARE PERFORMED MAINLY BY THE ARMORED FORCES? LAYS LAND MINES (SCORE AS -1) PROTECTS TROOPS FROM MECHANIZED ATTACKS (SCORE AS +1) TRANSPORTS TROOPS TO THE FRONT (SCORE AS -1) USES HEAVY TANKS (SCORE AS +1)
